meanings.sent1: The bubblier soap made bigger bubbles in the bath.
meanings.sent2: The soda was bubblier than the juice.
meanings.sent3: The bubblier water in the fountain sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bubblier stream flowing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The bubblier aquarium was a mesmerizing sight with all the fish swimming around.

meanings.definition: More lively and cheerful than usual
meanings.sent1: The bubblier puppy wagged its tail excitedly.
meanings.sent2: She felt bubblier after hearing the good news.
meanings.sent3: The bubblier music lifted everyone's spirits at the party.
meanings.sent4: His bubblier personality always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bubblier atmosphere at the carnival put a smile on everyone's face.
